rng.matmodops¶

Useful matrix/modulus operations for mrg32k3a generator.

Listing¶

mat33_mat31_mult mat33_mat33_mult mat31_mod mat33_mod mat33_mat33_mod mat33_power_mod

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

mat33_mat31_mult(A, b)

Multiply a 3x3 matrix with a 3x1 matrix.

mat33_mat33_mult(A, B)

Multiply a 3x3 matrix with a 3x3 matrix.

mat31_mod(b, m)

Compute moduli of a 3x1 matrix.

mat33_mod(A, m)

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix.

mat33_mat33_mod(A, B, m)

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix x 3x3 matrix product.

mat33_power_mod(A, j, m)

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix power.
rng.matmodops.mat33_mat31_mult(A, b)¶

Multiply a 3x3 matrix with a 3x1 matrix.

Parameters

  • A (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • b (list of float) – 3x1 matrix

Returns

res – 3x1 matrix

Return type

list of float

rng.matmodops.mat33_mat33_mult(A, B)¶

Multiply a 3x3 matrix with a 3x3 matrix.

Parameters

  • A (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • B (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

Returns

res – 3x3 matrix

Return type

list of float

rng.matmodops.mat31_mod(b, m)¶

Compute moduli of a 3x1 matrix.

Parameters

  • b (list of float) – 3x1 matrix

  • m (float) – modulus

Returns

res – 3x1 matrix

Return type

list of float

rng.matmodops.mat33_mod(A, m)¶

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix.

Parameters

  • A (list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • m (float) – modulus

Returns

res – 3x3 matrix

Return type

list of float

rng.matmodops.mat33_mat33_mod(A, B, m)¶

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix x 3x3 matrix product.

Parameters

  • A (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • B (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • m (float) – modulus

Returns

res – 3x3 matrix

Return type

list of list of float

rng.matmodops.mat33_power_mod(A, j, m)¶

Compute moduli of a 3x3 matrix power. Use divide-and-conquer algorithm described in L’Ecuyer (1990).

Parameters

  • A (list of list of float) – 3x3 matrix

  • j (int) – exponent

  • m (float) – modulus

Returns

res – 3x3 matrix

Return type

list of list of float
